column4: Im looking for a way to sort of mirror my laptop harddrive to my external drive, when I delete something on the computer it gets deleted on the external and when I add something to my computer it is added to the external, and all of this I want to happen when I plugin external..any ideas? :)
rsync is one way, unison is two-way
two-way? so if I add something to the external it is added to my laptop as well?
it synchronises the most recent files
